alert.note: Alert for Wheeler (Texas) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Flood Advisory issued June 01 at 9:08AM CDT until June 04 at 7:00PM CDT by NWS Amarillo
info.description: ...The National Weather Service in Amarillo has issued a Flood Advisory for the following rivers in Texas... Sweetwater Creek at Kelton 5N affecting Wheeler County. For the Sweetwater Creek...including Kelton 5N...elevated river levels are forecast. ...FLOOD ADVISORY IN EFFECT FROM THIS MORNING TO SUNDAY EVENING... * WHAT...Flooding caused by excessive rainfall is expected. * WHERE...Sweetwater Creek at Kelton 5N. * WHEN...From this morning to Sunday evening. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - At 8:45 AM CDT Thursday the stage was 7.3 feet. - Forecast...The river is expected to rise to a crest of 13.0 feet early tomorrow afternoon. - Action stage is 11.0 feet. - Flood stage is 18.0 feet. - http://www.weather.gov/safety/flood &&
info.instruction: If you encounter a flooded roadway, turn around and find an alternative route. Additional information is available at www.weather.gov. The next statement will be issued at 9 AM Friday.this evening at 915 PM CDT.
